letters.description: Identify imbalances in the client's energy field using intuition, dowsing, or other energy assessment techniques.
Pinpoint specific energy blockages or chakra imbalances contributing to the client's concerns.
Select and strategically place crystals to harmonize and rebalance the energy field.
Facilitate the healing process through guided meditation, affirmations, and visualization techniques.
Provide ongoing support and education to empower clients to maintain energetic balance and overall wellbeing.
